page.title: 17Industry & employment,k.Lynn
page.content: Employment in our area is mainly in the areas of:-{1)agriculture}-farming or processing the products of land and sea{2)light industry}-engineering, packaging,valve making on North Lynn industrial estate {3)industry related to the docks}e.g. chemicals(Dows),wood sawmills {4)tourism}-this plays an important part as King's Lynn has many historic buildings and is within easy distance of Sandringham (6mls) and the coast(Hunstanton 15mls.) {5)commerce. The people in South Wootton tend to be professional groups and are employed in such areas as:_banking,building societies or are middle or higher level management in the larger firms.There are also quite a lot involved in education.Because of their occupations they tend to be fairly mobile-moving every 3-4years.
